original_text:
Your prophets have seen for you
    false and deceptive visions;
they have not exposed your iniquity
    to restore your fortunes,
but have seen for you oracles
    that are false and misleading.
korean_text: 네 선지자들이 네게 대하여 헛되고 어리석은 묵시를 보았으므로 네 죄악을 드러내어서 네가 사로잡힌 것을 돌이키지 못하였도다 그들이 거짓 경고와 미혹하게 할 것만 보았도다

sentences.original_text: Your prophets have seen for you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 선지자들이 너희를 위해 본 것은

sentences.original_text: they have not exposed your iniquity

sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 복된 형편을 회복시키려 함도 아니하고

sentences.original_text: but have seen for you oracles
